body_html:
The lock is activated by use_locking option. Here's a simple experiment to confirm -- https://gist.github.com/yaroslavvb/3a53132dcddc8ff47e4e919579b98c6a

If you turn on use_locking, then each read takes at least as long as each write. If you turn it off, the reads are near instant.
body_text:
The lock is activated by use_locking option. Here's a simple experiment to confirm -- https://gist.github.com/yaroslavvb/3a53132dcddc8ff47e4e919579b98c6a
If you turn on use_locking, then each read takes at least as long as each write. If you turn it off, the reads are near instant.
body:
The lock is activated by `use_locking` option. Here's a simple experiment to confirm -- https://gist.github.com/yaroslavvb/3a53132dcddc8ff47e4e919579b98c6a

If you turn on `use_locking`, then each read takes at least as long as each write. If you turn it off, the reads are near instant.
